body_html:
Thanks for the suggestion. I'll try everything as is first, just keeping in mind the memory copying and your recommendation, and then try to implement it (or just try to jump over and go directly to feed from the GPU memory).
BTW - here is the project where we need fast feed (just converted the trained network to have stage2 fully convolutional) - https://blog.elphel.com/2018/09/neural-network-doubled-effective-baseline-of-the-stereo-camera/

body:
Thanks for the suggestion. I'll try everything as is first, just keeping in mind the memory copying and your recommendation, and then try to implement it (or just try to jump over and go directly to feed from the GPU memory).
BTW - here is the project where we need fast feed (just converted the trained network to have stage2 fully convolutional) - https://blog.elphel.com/2018/09/neural-network-doubled-effective-baseline-of-the-stereo-camera/
